review: My husband wanted to try this especially to order the MLB subscription. Easy to install and hook-up-just follow the instructions on the screen. Since we also have Amazon Prime, it was a good way to use what Amazon prime has to offer.

review: Great little device. I discovered that it works seamlessly with my Sony Bravia remote also. It doesn't need supplied remote for the TV.Edited: 6/21/2015It doesn't work in India. I bough this device because I got one month of free prime with Amazon fire phone purchase. All I can do with this device is to watch YouTube and my TV already has YouTube inbuilt - this is an effective waste of money for me. Amazon should warn users registered with India address of this fact - all the videos give some license errors.
